originalText.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this place!!! Gleny is an absolute super star who has helped me lose inches and stay svelte! She is professional, personable and cares about her clients. She goes above and beyond to give you the results you want. So thrilled I found this place.

originalText.text: Fantastic treatments! The health benefits of improved circulation & stimulation are key to this treatment. I was certified & trained in Endermogy treatments in  Australia. One major thing I missed after moving back to US was not having “endermology” treatments. So....Finding this place has made me so happy. Both technicians give a great treatment!

text.text: Fantastic treatments! The health benefits of improved circulation & stimulation are key to this treatment. I was certified & trained in Endermogy treatments in  Australia. One major thing I missed after moving back to US was not having “endermology” treatments. So....Finding this place has made me so happy. Both technicians give a great treatment!

originalText.text:
This Cellulite Endermologie Center is a great place. It is very clean and orderly; it is also in a very good location. I came to my appointment very early in the morning, I thought that I would have to wait a while, but all of the staff was there, ready to greet me and serve me right away. The other thing that was also very important to me, and that I observed, was that all of the people there are very professional and very nice. I was very worried prior to going in to have the treatment. However, they were very patient, polite and sensitive with me. They took extra care to explain things to me, and answered all of my questions. They made me feel very comfortable while, also calming my fears and worries. I had my treatment at the Cellulite Endermologie Center with Thyais.  She was very good, she knows what she is doing, she was well trained.

She used the oils on me, and wrapped me in the blanket for about 45 minutes. During this time, the came into the room, and checked on me many times. I felt so much better afterward, and I can tell you that the treatments really work, because I have lost weight, and the cellulite is going away.  I am trying to loose more weight and inches, so I need to continue the treatments.

Will I go back? YES, this is 100% definite!!!!   It was totally beneficial; I could see the results right away. It was a very good experience, with very professional and nice people. In fact, I have already scheduled some additional appointments for the treatments.

This is a great place, I highly recommend it!!!!!!

MM

originalText.text: I've been going to this endermoligie center for so many years and I never leave disappointed. The staff take great care of their clients! Gleny always checks in with me and asks if everything is okay and offers to bring me water. I will keep going back to this place! Highly Recommend!!

originalText.text: I love this place. I wouldn't go anywhere else for endermologie, slimming or any other body treatment. The staff is great. I especially love my aesthetician, Gleny. She is so knowledgeable and professional. Keep up the great work!
